meanings.definition: A cold Spanish soup made from tomatoes, peppers, cucumbers, and other vegetables.
meanings.sent1: I enjoyed a refreshing bowl of gazpacho on a hot summer day.
meanings.sent2: The restaurant served gazpacho as an appetizer before the main course.
meanings.sent3: When the gazpacho spilled, it looked like a colorful vegetable waterfall.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was as cool and soothing as a bowl of gazpacho on a sunny afternoon.
meanings.sent5: The vibrant red color of the gazpacho reminded me of a summer garden in a bowl.

meanings.definition: A dish of chilled soup made from raw blended vegetables.
meanings.sent1: The gazpacho had a delightful mix of flavors from the fresh vegetables.
meanings.sent2: At the picnic, everyone enjoyed the cool and tangy gazpacho.
meanings.sent3: The gazpacho was so cold, it felt like a vegetable ice cream soup.
meanings.sent4: Her creativity flowed like a gazpacho recipe, blending different ideas together.
meanings.sent5: The gazpacho was like a garden party in a bowl, with each vegetable adding its own flair.
